column4: yes it is but how can i get the vmx file with the system i want to run?
you can't legally unless you own the system, and then you need to use vmware, not vmware player to install it as a vmx....it isn't hard to find the vmx though
but can i make the vmx file that i will be able to use on ubuntu?
if you have vmware you can actually install 98 on its own, but you can find vmx files to use in vmware player
